roleset.name: (cause to) be around
roleset.note: ENCLOSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'enclose' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 47.8. (from enclose.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive, no agent
example.text: [The entire site]-1 is enclosed [*-1]by a 6-to-8-foot-high ornamental iron fence with a small number of remote-controlled gates.
example.arg: a 6-to-8-foot-high ornamental iron fence with a small number of remote-controlled gates

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: And I -LSB- agree with -RSB- Prince Faisal , that it is essential to consider the interests of the nation and the interests of development in the Kingdom , but I enclosed the picture per the request of its owner .
example.arg: per the request of its owner
